TEXT: 这是第一行描述。 NL 这是第二行描述。

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~onion,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
